thread.title: Celebrating 6 Years of Designmodo with a Discount and Giveaway!
thread.title_full: Celebrating 6 Years of Designmodo with a Discount and Giveaway!

author: Andrian
title: Celebrating 6 Years of Designmodo with a Discount and Giveaway!
text:
Today, we are celebrating our sixth year with an anniversary party, and because you are part of our community, let’s start the party together! About Our Team 
Many of you may not know who we are, so this is a perfect day to get acquainted with us. I’m Andrian (founder and editor-in-chief) and I’m from the Republic of Moldova, but now live in Barcelona (Spain) with my wife Diana , who creates useful infographics for Designmodo’s readers. The other Designmodo team members are from the United States — Sergey (web developer) and Edvard (managing partner). Also, we have writers that help us create web design content; you can find their names at the beginning of each article. 
The last six years has been a fantastic time of change and meeting new people. We have created many products that make our industry better. We will continue to create and develop the new products. Thank you! Designmodo Team Birthday Discount – 40% Off! 
Because it’s our birthday we want to give you some gifts. Purchase our products now and save 40% off the regular price . 
Use coupon code : SIX Giveaway! 
One more gift for all of our readers: We’ll give you Slides framework for free ! Prizes : Slides framework licenses ($249 each) for 3 winners! Want to win? Just share and comment on this post, and we’ll choose three winners using random.org. Discount coupon and giveaway expiration: April 4, 2017 (midnight EST). 
Thank you so much for being a Designmodo fan and reader, and for being helpful, engaging and supportive, and for staying with us all this time. 
Cheers, everyone!
